name: switch-match
description: A simple match function for JavaScript, similar to switch-case statements but in parallel using web workers.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && vite build && tsup ./lib/index.ts --dts --dts-only
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run test --run && pnpm run build

author: Levy van der Valk <levyvandervalk@gmail.com>
